string-array.name: hdcp_checking_summaries
string-array.item: Only check HDCP for DRM contents

string-array.name: sp_carrier_legal_NORMAL
string-array.item: If you use a 3rd party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require your carrier to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or some other 3rd party.

"Which Privacy Policy Applies? Your carrier's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your handset that are solely provided by 3rd parties. The 3rd party's policies apply to your use of this app."

"Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Privacy Policies, Terms of Use and other consumer notices MAY BE available on the provider's website. Be sure you are comfortable with the policies before you use an app."
"Where Can I Find my carrier's Privacy Policy? Separately, if you have questions about your carrier's Privacy Policy, please visit your carrier's homepage and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."

string-array.name: sp_carrier_legal_virgin_NORMAL
string-array.item: If you use a 3rd party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require Virgin Mobile to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or some other 3rd party.

"Which Privacy Policy Applies? Virgin Mobile's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your handset that are solely provided by 3rd parties. The 3rd party's policies apply to your use of this app."

"Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Privacy Policies, Terms of Use and other consumer notices MAY BE available on the provider's website. Be sure you are comfortable with the policies before you use an app."
"Where Can I Find Virgin Mobile's Privacy Policy? Separately, if you have questions about Virgin Mobile's Privacy Policy, please visit VirginMobileUSA.com and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."
